Posts.Title: Underarm and Shoulder Pain - Very anxious. IrishLass27 IrishLass27

Posts.Content: IrishLass27 wrote: A bit of a long one so please hear me out! About two weeks ago I was having pain in my left breast. I found a lump and went to the doctor who prescribed me Augmentin to treat it as he diasgnosed it as a cyst. He told me to return if the pain had not subsided and he would send me for a mammogram. Anyway, pain and lump went away so didn’t go back. I have a very bad chest infection this week and I’ve been getting severe pain under my arm and in my shoulder on the same side that the cyst was on. No apparent lumps or bumps and pain feels achey, like muscular pain. Everyone is telling me that it is probably glands from my chest infection and indeed maybe sore muscles. I’m just wondering if maybe the cyst and this pain could be related? There is no pain in my breast at all at present just my armpit and shoulder. I am a really bad hypochondriac so indeed I could be overthinking and I am sorry for rambling. Many thanks x Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Underarm and Shoulder Pain - Very anxious. IrishLass27 IrishLass27
